name: Campus Dynasty
description:
Start your coaching career at a small school and build your reputation. Challenged with school expectations, dynamic play styles, and recruiting battles, your goal is to win as many conference championships and national titles as possible. With 256 teams in 16 conferences all competing for the national championship, the task will not be easy.

Create a mobile version of yourself and choose your offensive and defensive schemes. Manage your lineups and player usage rates to form a competitive team. Analyze statistics to adjust your strategy and give your team the greatest chance to win each game. Compete in conference tournaments to secure a bid to the national tournament, and continue that momentum to cut down the nets.
